entry.title: 백준 - 나무 자르기(#2805)
entry.content:
import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

N,M = map(int,input().split())
namu = list(map(int,input().split()))
cutting = 0

def binarySearch(array,start,end,target):
    if start>end: 
        return
    global cutting

    mid = (end+start)//2
    cut = 0
    for i in array:
        if i>mid:
            cut+=i-mid

    if cut<target:
        binarySearch(array,start,mid-1,target)
        
    else:
        cutting = mid
        binarySearch(array,mid+1,end,target)

binarySearch(namu,0,max(namu),M)
print(cutting)

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)
  • 백준 - 점프 점프

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 짝지어 제거하기
entry.content:
def solution(s):
    answer=1
    stack = []
    
    for i in s:
        if stack and i==stack[-1]:
            stack.pop()
            continue
            
        stack.append(i)
            
    if stack:
        answer=0
        
    return answer

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 주차 요금 계산
entry.content:
from collections import defaultdict
import math
def solution(fees, records):
    answer = []
    info = defaultdict(lambda: [])
    
    for i in records:
        a = i.split()
        info[a[1]].append(a[0])
        
    info = [x[1] for x in sorted(info.items(),key=lambda x: int(x[0]))]
    
    for i in info:
        fee = fees[1]
        time = 0
        
        if len(i)%2!=0:
            i.append("23:59")
            
        for j in range(0,len(i),2):
            start = int(i[j][:2])*60 + int(i[j][-2:])
            end = int(i[j+1][:2])*60 + int(i[j+1][-2:])
            time += end-start
            
        if time>fees[0]:
            fee += math.ceil((time-fees[0])/fees[2])*fees[3]
            
        answer.append(fee)
        
    return answer

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 올바른 괄호
entry.content:
#DFS를 이용한 풀이
def dfs(v,visited,graph):
    for i in graph[v]:
        if not visited[i]:
            visited[i]=True
            dfs(i,visited,graph)

def solution(n, computers):
    answer = 0
    graph = [[] for _ in range(n)]
    visited = [False] * n
    
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(len(computers[i])):
            if computers[i][j]!=0 and i!=j:
                graph[i].append(computers[i][j]*j)
    
    present=sum(visited)
    for i in range(n):
        visited[i]=True
        dfs(i,visited,graph)
        if present!=sum(visited):
            present=sum(visited)
            answer+=1
            
    return answer

#BFS를 이용한 풀이
from collections import deque

def bfs(v,nodes,visited,computers): 
    queue = deque([[v,nodes]])

    while queue:
        node = queue.popleft()
        visited[node[0]] = True

        for i in range(len(node[1])):
            if node[1][i]==1 and visited[i]==False:
                visited[i] = True
                queue.append([i,computers[i]])

def solution(n, computers):
    answer = 0

    visited = [False]*n

    for i in range(n):
        if not visited[i]:
            current_sum = sum(visited)

            bfs(i,computers[i],visited,computers)

            if sum(visited)!=current_sum:
                answer+=1
            
    return answer

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 구명보트
entry.content:
from collections import deque
def solution(people, limit):
    answer = 0
    people.sort()

    queue = deque(people)
    while len(queue)>=2:
        if queue[0]+queue[-1]<=limit:
            answer+=1
            queue.popleft()
            queue.pop()

        else:
            answer+=1
            queue.pop()

    if queue:
        answer+=1

    return answer

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 여행경로
entry.content:
from collections import defaultdict
def solution(tickets):
    airports = defaultdict(list)
    for x,y in tickets:
        airports[x].append(y)
        
    for i in airports.values():
        i.sort()

    stack = ["ICN"]
    route = []

    while stack:
        tail = stack[-1]

        if airports[tail]:
            stack.append(airports[tail].pop(0))

        else:
            path.append(stack.pop())

    return route[::-1]

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)

entry.title: 백준 - 점프 점프(#11060)
entry.content:
백준 11060

#BFS을 이용한 풀이법
from collections import deque
import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

n = int(input())
jump = list(map(int, input().split()))
visited = [False]*n

def bfs(i, j):
    visited[0] = True   
    queue = deque([[i, j]])

    while queue:
        pos, cnt = queue.popleft()

        if pos == n - 1:
            return cnt

        for i in range(1, jump[pos] + 1):
            if pos + i < n and visited[pos + i] == False:
                visited[pos + i] = True
                queue.append([pos + i, cnt + 1])
    return -1


print(bfs(0, 0))

#Dynamic Programming을 이용한 풀이법
import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

N = int(input())
jump = list(map(int,input().split()))

d = [N]*N
d[0] = 0

for i in range(N):
    for j in range(i,jump[i]+1):
        d[i+j] = min(d[i+j],d[i]+1)

print(d[N-1] if d[N]-1!=N else -1)

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 네트워크
entry.content:
#DFS를 이용한 풀이
def dfs(v,visited,graph):
    for i in graph[v]:
        if not visited[i]:
            visited[i]=True
            dfs(i,visited,graph)

def solution(n, computers):
    answer = 0
    graph = [[] for _ in range(n)]
    visited = [False] * n
    
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(len(computers[i])):
            if computers[i][j]!=0 and i!=j:
                graph[i].append(computers[i][j]*j)
    
    present=sum(visited)
    for i in range(n):
        visited[i]=True
        dfs(i,visited,graph)
        if present!=sum(visited):
            present=sum(visited)
            answer+=1
            
    return answer

#BFS를 이용한 풀이
from collections import deque

def bfs(v,nodes,visited,computers): 
    queue = deque([[v,nodes]])

    while queue:
        node = queue.popleft()
        visited[node[0]] = True

        for i in range(len(node[1])):
            if node[1][i]==1 and visited[i]==False:
                visited[i] = True
                queue.append([i,computers[i]])

def solution(n, computers):
    answer = 0

    visited = [False]*n

    for i in range(n):
        if not visited[i]:
            current_sum = sum(visited)

            bfs(i,computers[i],visited,computers)

            if sum(visited)!=current_sum:
                answer+=1
            
    return answer

entry.title: 소프티어 - 조립라인
entry.content:
소프티어 조립라인

import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

N = int(input())
assembly = [list(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(N)] 

d = [[0,0] for _ in range(N)]
d[0] = [assembly[0][0], assembly[0][1]]

for i in range(1, N):
    d[i] = [min(d[i-1][0], d[i-1][1] + assembly[i-1][3]) + assembly[i][0],
             min(d[i-1][1], d[i-1][0] + assembly[i-1][2]) + assembly[i][1]]

print(min(d[N-1]))

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)

entry.title: 프로그래머스 - 타겟넘버
entry.content:
from collections import deque

def solution(numbers, target):
    answer = 0
    queue = deque([[0,0]])

    while queue:
        accum, cnt = queue.popleft()

        if cnt!=len(numbers):
            queue.append([accum+numbers[cnt],cnt+1])
            queue.append([accum-numbers[cnt],cnt+1])

        elif accum==target:
            answer+=1
            
    return answer

  • 백준 - 섬의 개수(#4963)
  • 백준 - 치즈(#2638)
